content: अवस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [अव्-भावे असिच्] <ab>Ved.</ab> {@--1@} Protection, assistance. {@--2@} Fame, celebrity. {@--3@} Food, provision. {@--4@} Wealth; riches. {@--5@} Going. {@--6@} Satisfaction, pleasure. {@--7@} Wish, will, desire, aspiration. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} [अवर-प्रथमायाः पंचम्या सप्तम्या वाऽर्थे असि, अव् आदेशः <ls>P. V. 3. 39</ls>] {@--1@} Below, downwards, hitherward. {@--2@} (As a preposition with <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>) ({%a%}) Below, at the lowest place. ({%b%}) Without, on the outside.
